The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog near the old barn.
She sells seashells by the seashore every summer morning.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step forward.
Time flies like an arrow and fruit flies like a banana.
The early bird catches the worm but the second mouse gets the cheese.
Practice makes perfect when you work hard every single day.
All that glitters is not gold in this modern world.
Actions speak louder than words in every situation you face.
Knowledge is power and education is the key to success.
Life is what happens when you are busy making other plans.
